duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and implement core talent processes and programs for 2,000+ global employees.
Partner with HRBPs on org-level strategies and company-wide programs.
Build roadmap for performance enablement process, year-end performance and promotion processes, talent review, and succession planning.
Design and develop leadership framework and assessment approach.
Lead change management and communications for program roll out and adoption.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in HR, Business, or related field (Master's preferred)
